titleStmt.title: The ansvver of the Estates of Parliament of the kingdom of Scotland to His Majesties most gracious letter direct to them.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to Their most excellent Majesties,
